10 REM COPY ROUTINE
11 FOR I=0 TO 26: READ X: POKE 828+I,X: NEXT I
12 DATA 169,000,160,208,133,095,132,096
13 DATA 169,000,160,224,133,090,132,091
14 DATA 169,000,160,064,133,088,132,089
15 DATA 076,191,163
16 REM COPY $D000-$DFFF -> $3000-$3FFF
20 REM CHARSET ROM INTO RAM
21 POKE 56334,PEEK(56334) AND 254
22 POKE 1,PEEK(1) AND 251
23 SYS 828
24 POKE 1,PEEK(1) OR 4
25 POKE 56334,PEEK(56334) OR 1
26 POKE 53272,PEEK(53272) AND 240 OR 12
60 REM GERMAN MUTATED VOWELS ae, ou, ue, ss
61 FOR A=12800 TO 13055: READ ZE: POKE A,ZE: NEXT A
062 DATA 000,003,003,003,003,003,127,127
063 DATA 000,192,192,192,192,192,254,254
064 DATA 127,127,003,003,003,003,003,000
065 DATA 254,254,192,192,192,192,192,000

066 DATA 000,000,000,125,253,133,133,253
067 DATA 000,000,000,255,255,255,255,255
068 DATA 253,253,252,255,159,096,096,000
069 DATA 255,255,000,255,207,048,048,000

070 DATA 000,000,000,000,001,001,001,001
080 DATA 000,063,127,224,192,192,128,128
081 DATA 001,001,001,015,007,003,001,000
082 DATA 128,128,128,240,224,192,128,000

083 DATA 000,001,003,007,015,003,003,003
084 DATA 000,128,192,224,240,192,192,192
085 DATA 003,003,003,003,003,127,127,000
086 DATA 192,192,192,192,192,254,254,000

087 DATA 000,001,003,003,001,000,007,015
088 DATA 000,128,192,192,128,000,224,240
089 DATA 031,031,031,031,031,031,031,031
090 DATA 248,248,248,248,248,248,248,248

091 DATA 000,000,031,016,031,016,031,016
092 DATA 000,000,224,016,240,016,240,016
093 DATA 031,016,031,016,031,240,255,255
094 DATA 240,016,240,016,240,031,255,255

095 DATA 000,000,000,000,000,000,007,004
096 DATA 000,000,000,000,000,000,224,032
097 DATA 012,015,127,127,103,024,024,000
098 DATA 048,240,254,254,230,024,024,000

099 DATA 000,001,003,007,015,003,003,003
100 DATA 000,128,192,224,240,192,192,192
101 DATA 003,003,003,003,003,003,003,000
102 DATA 192,192,192,192,192,192,192,000

103 FOR A=13056 TO 13087: READ ZE: POKE A,ZE: NEXT A

104 DATA 000,000,065,097,113,121,125,127
105 DATA 000,000,140,140,140,140,140,140
106 DATA 127,125,121,113,097,065,000,000
107 DATA 140,140,140,140,140,140,000,000

120 FOR I=0 TO 7:GOTO 121
121 PRINT CHR$(I*4+96);: PRINT CHR$(I*4+97)
122 PRINT CHR$(I*4+98);: PRINT CHR$(I*4+99)
123 NEXT I
124 PRINT CHR$(160);: PRINT CHR$(161)
125 PRINT CHR$(162);: PRINT CHR$(163)
130 GOTO 120
